glosses: to pretend to be, to present oneself as

examples.translation: He hides his cowardness and pretends to be a hero

glosses: to show out, to boast with something
to make steel into a hammer

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish طاسلامق (taslamak), تصلمق (taslamak). According to Nişanyan, ultimately derived from Proto-Oghuz تَسْ (/⁠tas⁠/, “bad of everything”). He also compares [script needed] (tösle-). Cognate with Turkmen taslanmak.
